alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 8:28AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy Snow for the next Hour... A band of moderate to heavy snow was pushing across southern New Mexico and far west Texas this morning. The snow, heavy at times, will accumulate up to an inch on grassy surfaces and other cold objects like cars and outdoor furniture. The main impact for driving will be wet and slippery roads. Little or no accumulations on the streets and roads is expected. The band of snow will continue off an on for the next couple of hours. The rest of the day will breezy with much colder temperatures than we saw on Thursday.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
